page.title: 09SURVEY RESULT TRANSPORT.
page.content:
GLOSSARY. C -Car. Cy - Cycle. T = Train B = Bus. W = Walk.
age total C CY T B W Others/non.
16/29 43 23 9 0 2 3 7 30/44 55 48 5 0 3 1 5 45/64 88 69 9 0 5 2 7 CONCLUSIONS FROM OUR SAMPLES. 1.As people get older more go to work by car. 2. In an area surrounded by agric. land very few are actually involved in agric. 3. In this area the majority are employed in Industry or Local Govt.in ages 44/64. 4.The great majority of people work within 10 miles of home. 5.Of the people who travel over 50 m. several were in the Forces.6. We know there is unemployment in the area, therefore the survey must be at fault.
